1. Scroll Behavior Test: Scroll down and up to test the show/hide behavior. The button should hide when scrolling up and show when scrolling down.
2. Mobile Responsiveness: Open this page on a mobile device or use browser dev tools to test mobile view. Button position should adjust appropriately.
3. Accessibility Test: Use Tab key to navigate to the WhatsApp button. It should be focusable and have proper ARIA labels.
4. Animation Test: Hover over the button to see tooltip and pulse animations. Reduce motion preferences should disable animations.
5. Click Test: Click the button to verify it opens WhatsApp with the pre-filled message.

  • Responsive positioning on mobile
